amendment.description: An amendment numbered 155 printed in Part A of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funds from being used to implement section 370 of Public Law 116-283.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for the Defense Department's Commission on the naming of Confederate entities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clyde amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 261 (Roll no. 436).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Clyde amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 261 (Roll no. 436).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
